item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "You are speaking of my future lover. Be more respectful." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Our story has three parts: a beginning, a middle, and an end. And although this is the way all stories unfold, I still can't believe that ours didn't go on forever." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
Caitlyn add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "When the day shall come that we do part," he said softly, and turned to look at me, "if my last words are not 'I love you'-ye'll ken it was because I didna have time." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "Blood of my Blood," he whispered, "and bone of my bone. You carry me within ye, Claire, and ye canna leave me now, no matter what happens, You are mine, always, if ye will it or no, if ye want me or nay. Mine, and I wilna let ye go." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Did we have sex?" he asked directly. For about two minutes, this might actually be fun. "Eric," I said, "we had sex in every position I could imagine, and some I couldn’t. We had sex in every room in my house, and we had sex outdoors. You told me it was the best you’d ever had." (At the time he couldn’t recall all the sex he’d ever had. But he’d paid me a compliment.) "Too bad you can’t remember it," I concluded with a modest smile. Eric looked like I’d hit him in the forehead with a mallet. For all of thirty seconds his reaction was completely gratifying." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are my best friend as well as my lover, and I do not know which side of you I enjoy the most. I treasure each side, just as I have treasured our life together." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "- "Why don't you like to be touched?" - "Because I'm fifty shades of fucked-up, Anastasia" -- E.L. James

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by E.L. James
Caitlyn add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I'd like to bite that lip." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "My subconscious is furious, medusa-like in her anger, hair flying, her hands clenched around her face like Edvard Munch's Scream." -- E.L. James

item.title: Caitlyn add a quote by Amanda Hocking
item.description: "I don't want only one night. I want all the nights. I want all of you, forever." -- Amanda Hocking
